union_find.name: Union-Find - Basic Structure
union_find.description: Implement a basic disjoint set union (Union-Find) structure with parent initialization and the ability to find the root of any element.

union_find.name: Union-Find - Union by Rank
union_find.description: Extend a Union-Find structure to support union by rank/size to reduce tree height during merges. Return True if a merge happened, False if already in same set.

union_find.name: Union-Find - Path Compression
union_find.description: Implement path compression in the find operation so that each node on the path directly points to its root, optimizing repeated find operations.

union_find.name: Union-Find - Count Connected Components
union_find.description: Given n nodes labeled 0..n-1 and a list of undirected edges, use Union-Find to compute the number of connected components after processing all edges.
union_find.signature: def count_components(n: int, edges: List[List[int]]) -> int:

union_find.name: Union-Find - Cycle Detection in Undirected Graph
union_find.description: Given an undirected graph, determine whether a cycle exists by joining endpoints of each edge using Union-Find. If two endpoints share a root before union, a cycle exists.
union_find.signature: def has_cycle(n: int, edges: List[List[int]]) -> bool:

union_find.name: Union-Find - Number of Islands (Grid DSU)
union_find.description: Given a 2D grid of '0' and '1', treat each land cell as a node and union adjacent land cells to determine the number of islands using DSU.
